!Gilmore: The Hero of an ancient ages had power to destoy them, but now *Dragon Valley* turned into their land, so they found the way back. These are the same: *Emerald Horn, Dust Rider, Bleeding Fly, Black Dagger Wing, Shadow Summoner, Spike Slasher, Muscle Bomber*.
